text: This section describes the FTPS collection and FTPS forwarding agents. These agents are for batch workflow configurations and support the Transport Layer Security (TLS) and the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) cryptographic protocols. Prerequisites The reader of this information should be familiar with: Standard FTP (RFC 959, http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc0959.txt ) FTP Security Extensions ( RFC 2228, http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2228.txt ) The section contains the following subsections: FTPS Collection Agent FTPS Forwarding Agent
title: FTPS Agents - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
